ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the sale of children, child prostitution and child pornography

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: Doc. A/RES/54/263; C.N.1032.2000.TREATIES-72 of 14 November 2000 [rectification of the the original of the Protocol (Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian and Spanish authentic texts)]; C.N.1008.2002.TREATIES-42 of 17 September 2002 (proposal of corrections to the original chinese text) and C.N.1312.2002.TREATIES-49 of 16 December 2002 [rectification of the original of the Protocol (Chinese authentic text)].

TreatyNote.Text: The Optional Protocol was adopted by resolution A/RES/54/263 of 25 May 2000 at the fifty-fourth session of the General Assembly of the United Nations. In accordance with its article 13?1), the Optional Protocol will be open for signature by any State that is a party to the Convention or has signed it.
